This page on SteamDB showcases a curated list of Steam games tagged under 'Visual Novel'. Visual Novels are an interactive story-driven video game genre. They originated in Japan, but have gained popularity worldwide due to their immersive narratives and engaging character interactions. The genre often includes multiple-choice dialogue options, branching storylines, and illustrative art styles. The games on this page are updated automatically, ensuring that you have access to the latest Visual Novel releases on Steam.
